name: Static Core
text: Passive. The assigned player cannot use the passive effects of their card suits.

name: Numb Leg
text: Passive. The assigned player’s hand capacity is permanently reduced by 1 for this Chapter.

name: Auxiliary Battery
text: Once per Chapter, after the reveal, this player may contribute one additional card from their hand to the Pulse.

name: Fuse
text: Once per Chapter, after the reveal, this player may choose one played card (theirs or an ally's) and reduce its value to 0 for that Pulse.

name: Muddled Sensors
text: Passive. The assigned player must play their first card face-down before the Terrain card for the next Step is revealed.

name: Cooling Fan
text: Passive. When this player plays a Steam card, it reduces Heat by 1.

name: Cracked Pistons
text: Passive. If the group Undershoots, this player has to discard an extra card from his hand.

name: Heavy Chassis
text: Passive. This player’s cards always count as +2 value.

name: Sharp Eye
text: Passive. This player may secretly inspect the 5 Terrain cards of the current Chapter at any time, including before the reveal phase.
